title: Deploy the app to production and surface the live .icp0.io URL

requirements.text: Perform a production deployment (not a preview build) so the app is accessible publicly, and provide the final public frontend URL in the deployment output in the exact format: "Your production canister is live at: https://<canister-id>.icp0.io".
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is executed successfully (not just a preview build).
The deployment result includes a line that starts with: "Your production canister is live at:".
The printed URL is an https://<canister-id>.icp0.io address and can be opened in a browser to load the app.

requirements.text: Fix the deployment feedback/output so that production deployments reliably include the final public .icp0.io live link line (the missing URL line noted as a known issue in this project).
acceptanceCriteria: After a production deployment, the final output includes the live link line with an .icp0.io URL.
Repeated production deployments continue to show the live link line consistently.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing new product features (ERP/LMS modules) beyond deployment and deployment output visibility.
Changing application UI/UX unrelated to deployment.
